content.synopsis:
Helen Mirren and Pierce Brosnan lead this Netflix adaptation of the Richard Osman novel

Elizabeth, Ron, Ibrahim, and Joyce are four retired friends who love to solve cold case murders for fun. With their combined skill set of a spy, a union leader, a psychiatrist, and a nurse, they are a formidable team ready to take on any case. But when a murder occurs on their own doorstep, the four amateur detectives find themselves wrapped up in a live investigation.
